channel.title: Running the server on utorrent?!? need help!
channel.description:
okay i want to turn my server online for public use.
I use a wireless internet. I want to use utorrent because i cant do the portforward thing. i put the connection thing to port 43594. when i put try to apply the thing in utorrent it says "[2009-12-08 21:19:26] TCP port bind failed 0.0.0.0:43594: (10048) Only one usage of each socket address (protocol/network address/port) is normally permitted. " i put an exception in the windows firewall . i have a no-ip and i run it. when i open my client and run the server it says error connecting to server.
i dont know what is wrong please someone help me!!!
thanx in advance

item.title: Running the server on utorrent?!? need help!

item.description:
@skaterb0y12 wrote:

okay i want to turn my server online for public use.

I use a wireless internet.
I want to use utorrent because i cant do the portforward thing.
i put the connection thing to port 43594.
when i put try to apply the thing in utorrent it says "[2009-12-08 21:19:26] TCP port bind failed 0.0.0.0:43594: (10048) Only one usage of each socket address (protocol/network address/port) is normally permitted. "
i put an exception in the windows firewall .
i have a no-ip and i run it.
when i open my client and run the server it says error connecting to server.

i dont know what is wrong please someone help me!!!

thanx in advance
